title: Sparkling Diamond Kada Bangles - Contemporary Vaibhavam
materials: featuring meticulously set brilliant-cut Diamonds. Exceptional clarity and brilliance. Superior Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: These kada bangles feature a continuous row of sparkling diamonds prong-set in gold. The design is simple yet striking, offering a modern take on the traditional Kada style. The prong setting allows maximum light to refract through the diamonds, enhancing their brilliance.
colors: Yellow Gold and brilliant White Diamonds.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift. Suitable for modern occasions and adds a touch of contemporary elegance to traditional attire for festivals or family gatherings.
description: These Kada bangles offer a blend of modern design with the timeless appeal of gold and diamonds. Crafted with precision and using high-quality materials, these bangles are designed for durability and lasting beauty. The simplicity of the design makes them versatile and easy to pair with other jewelry pieces.
